name: Rebind Typer
description:
Rebind Typer is a typing game which forces you to rebind keyboard keys to other keys. Think you are a good typer? See if you could beat Rebind Typer. 

Created for the GGJ2020.  Inspired by Sci-fi movies and missile command.

Developed by: Chris Choi, Joe Siu and Berman

Control： Keyboard to type, Drag the virtual keyboard to change keybinding.
